snippet: Cutting taxes and spending at a time of weak economic recovery is a losing strategy. Missouri has a chance to show that there’s a better way forward.
abstract: Editorial praises Missouri Gov Jay Nixon for fighting against a tax cut passed by Republican-controlled State Legislature, which came in the wake of drastic spending cuts on vital services; contends that if Nixon's veto of tax cut prevails, his effort should give heart to leaders in other states who are trying to prevent a race to the bottom.
lead_paragraph: Cutting taxes and spending at a time of weak economic recovery is a losing strategy. Missouri has a chance to show that there’s a better way forward.

headline.main: A Governor Battles Against Ruinous Tax Cuts
headline.print_headline: A Governor Battles Against Ruinous Tax Cuts
